alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Natchitoches; Red River (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 04 at 11:37PM CDT until November 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT FOR EASTERN RED RIVER...NORTHWESTERN NATCHITOCHES AND SOUTHEASTERN BIENVILLE PARISHES... At 1136 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles south of Gibsland to 10 miles southwest of Campti, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Campti, Allen, Martin, Clarence, Goldonna, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Bienville, Powhatan, Bryceland, Lake End, Brice, Friendship, Liberty Hill, Sailes, Chestnut and Clear Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
